## SLOs for Week 06

At the end of this unit, the student will be able to...

1.  Develop a backup and recovery plan for a database system.
2.  Explain different techniques for performance tuning.
3.  Understand database partitioning and indexing strategies.
4.  Profile SQL queries to detect inefficiencies.
5.  Discuss database integration with software applications.
6.  Apply database optimization techniques in real-world scenarios.
